# Demo_test-sassdoc

# Mixins

# before-sample() mixin

Meta
  • File: _test-sassdocs.scss
  • Group: demo_test-sassdoc
  • Type: mixin
  • Lines (comment range): 85-104
  • Lines (code): 105-110

Mixins can optionally accept a @content block, passed in brackets. This example creates a generated element :before the element it is used on.

# Examples

.item {
  @include samples.before-sample('Test One: ') {
    color: red;
  }
}

# Parameters

Name Type Description
$content String A value for the content property
$list… arglist Sass also allows arglists!
@content content block Any other styles that should be applied to the ::before element

# Mixin Output

A ::before pseudo-element, with the content property established, and any passed-in styled applied.

# Functions

# Examples

describe examples if you want...

.example::before {
  content: samples.herman-sample(1, 2);
}

# Parameters

Name Type Description
$one number The first parameter is required, because no default is given
$two number Our second parameter defaults to the value of our first one
$three string Looks like this one takes a string instead

# Returns

Type Description
list All three of the arguments in order
